publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1247 Mr Jamie Stone: Youth Hostels-That the Parliament congratulates the Youth Hostels Association and independent youth hostels for the opportunity they bring for many people who travel and welcomes the vital economic benefit which they contribute to the Scottish Tourist industry.

S1M-1247 Mr Jamie Stone: Youth Hostels—That the Parliament congratulates the Youth Hostels Association and independent youth hostels for the opportunity they bring for many people who travel and welcomes the vital economic benefit which they contribute to the Scottish Tourist industry. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Fiona McLeod*
